name: Caterpillar (itch) (Henry Threadwell)
description:
As this is our first year using Unity on the course, our first prototype development brief was to develop the caterpillar game you see here from the Game Design Document given to us.

As the player you must dismember the caterpillars body parts one by one, until only the head remains. Only then does the head of the caterpillar become vulnerable. Beware though as the caterpillar can regrow its body parts upon contact with them, with it's speed increasing (or decreasing) depending on the amount of body parts it is composed of.
